greetMessage: Hello, {{name}}! You've been greeted from Rust!
daisyAlert: This is a DaisyUI styled alert!
themeDescription: Switch between light and dark themes.
dragDropDescription: Example of drag and drop functionality.
languageTechStructureDesc: Translations are stored in separate JSON files (src/locales/*.json) for each language.
languageTechSwitchDesc: The i18n.ts module manages the current language state and loads the corresponding translations.
languageTechUIDesc: The language switcher menu dynamically lists all languages defined in src/locales/index.ts.
languageAddTitle: How to Add a New Language:
languageAddStep1: Create a new translation file src/locales/[code].json (e.g., es.json for Spanish).
languageAddStep2: Add all key-value pairs for translations in the new file.
languageAddStep3: Register the new language in src/locales/index.ts by adding it to the AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES array and the TRANSLATIONS_MAP object.
languageAddStep4: The language will automatically appear in the switcher menu.
themeTechStructureDesc: Themes are defined by CSS files (e.g., src/themes/lightsyn9.css) containing CSS variables for colors and other styles.
themeTechSwitchDesc: The App component manages the current theme state (lightsyn9, darksyn9) and applies a corresponding CSS class (e.g., .theme-lightsyn9) to the <html> element.
themeTechVarsDesc: Global styles in src/index.css use these CSS variables (e.g., var(--color-primary)) to dynamically adapt the UI appearance.
themeTechFilesDesc: The list of available themes is defined in src/themes/index.ts (AVAILABLE_THEMES array).
themeAddTitle: How to Add a New Theme:
themeAddStep1: Create a new CSS file in src/themes/ named after your theme ID (e.g., src/themes/mynewtheme.css).
themeAddStep2: Inside this file, define a CSS class (e.g., .theme-mynewtheme) and set all required CSS variables within it (see existing themes for reference).
themeAddStep3: Edit src/themes/index.ts: Add your theme's information (ID and display name) to the AVAILABLE_THEMES array.
themeAddStep4: Your theme will automatically appear in the theme switcher dropdown menu.
themeAddStep5: (Optional) Add a human-readable name for your theme in the translations files (src/locales/*.json) under a new key like themeNameMyNewTheme, and use t('themeNameMyNewTheme') in src/themes/index.ts.
settingsContent: Settings panel content will go here.
selectActivity: Please select an activity from the bar.
signatureVerificationFailed: Error: Could not verify update signature. (Possibly using a demo update file)
signatureWarning: Possible update signature issue. Using latest.json without proper signature?
noUpdateToInstall: Error: No available update to install.
signatureVerificationFailedInstall: Error: Failed to verify update signature. Installation aborted.
criticalSignatureError: CRITICAL ERROR: Update signature is invalid. Installation blocked by Tauri Updater.
